name: Coal Of Duty
description:
Ludum Dare 46 submission. Find the page here :D

At night, wandering in a fairy forest, you find a living fire who needs your help.

Walk through the forest and kick the burrows to wake up the coal balls. Make them fuel the fire! Defend yourself and your precious little friends from the terrible human-seafish monsters. Keep the fire alive and, hopefully, you will make it until dawn.

Have fun :)

The Team :

Prog : Thomas Foucault & Viet Toan Le

Graphics : Xuan Le

Sound Design: Viet Toan Le
